alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 6:53PM CST until March 05 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Eminence affecting Shannon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Jacks Fork at Eminence. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, low lying areas including the Rivers Edge Lodge and canoe rental locations in Eminence flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM CST Friday was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 5.1 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.7 feet on 04/04/1957. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
